pages.title: Scute
pages.text: You can obtain scute from turtles, from turtlemy or from rituals. It's an amazing material, don't waste it.

pages.title: Improved Scute
pages.text: The magically improved version of the scute. You can obtain it from $(l)$(l:turtlemy/basic_turtlemy#improved_scute)this turtlemy recipe$().
